pkgmetadata.longdescription: Matrix Computation Based Identification of Prime Implicants // Computes the prime implicants or a minimal disjunctive normal form for a logic expression presented by a truth table or a logic tree. Has been particularly developed for logic expressions resulting from a logic regression analysis, i.e. logic expressions typically consisting of up to 16 literals, where the prime implicants are typically composed of a maximum of 4 or 5 literals.
